title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 71 - Appeals Under Section 677 Of The Labor Law From Minimum Wage Compliance Orders Relating To Farm Workers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 71 - Appeals Under Section 677 Of The Labor Law From Minimum Wage Compliance Orders Relating To Farm Workers

State Regulations
§ 71.0 - Repealed
§ 71.1 - Application
§ 71.2 - Questions raised; scope of inquiry
§ 71.3 - How appeal commenced; time
§ 71.4 - Form and content of petition
§ 71.5 - Service of petition on commissioner of labor for answer
§ 71.6 - Answer to petition; time for answer; service and filing of answer
§ 71.7 - Contents of answer
§ 71.8 - Amendment of pleadings
§ 71.9 - Amendment of pleadings to conform to proof
§ 71.10 - Security for stay; waiver of security

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 71

Statutory authority: Labor Law, §
100[5]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
